actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill granting the consent of Congress to the compact of agreement between the States of North Dakota and Minnesota with respect to the boundary between the States.

summary.text: Interstate Compact - Grants the consent of Congress to the agreement between the States of North Dakota and Minnesota with respect to the boundary between such States.

titles.title: A bill granting the consent of Congress to the compact of agreement between the States of North Dakota and Minnesota with respect to the boundary between the States.
